text.div:
uslab-observationkind

Code to classify the kind of observation in Observation.value[x]

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/obs-kind defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
result resultThe value is Observation.value[x] is an actual result from a laboratory test
response responseThe value is Observation.value[x] is a response to laboratory Ask at order (AOE) questions
information informationThe value is Observation.value[x] is some other unsolicited clnically relevant information.

name: uslab-observationkind
description: Code to classify the kind of observation in Observation.value[x]

concept.definition: The value is Observation.value[x] is an actual result from a laboratory test
